Method Detail

countWordLength

public int[] countWordLength(edu.duke.FileResource resource,
                             int[] counts)
This method read in the words from resource and count the number of words of each length for all the words in resource, storing these counts in the array counts.

Parameters:
resource - file resource.
counts - array of words with index as the word length.
Returns:
counts array after counting.
